[quest]Space Scaler[/quest]

§6Machine Type: §aCompressor§r | §aExtractor§r | §aParticle Collider§r | §aElectric Implosion Compressor§r | §aNeutronium Compressor§r

Has Parallel Equivalent to §9Perfect Overclock§r.

Using an Ultimate Containment Field Generator enables §c10x§r Speed Multiplier. 

Crude Stabilisation Field Generator enables §aParticle Collider§r Mode. 

Gallifreyan Stabilisation Field Generator enables §aElectric Implosion Compressor§r & §aNeutronium Compressor§r Mode. 

In §aParticle Collider§r Mode, higher tier = more output. 

§9T2§r Block unlocks HIP
§9T3§r Block unlocks Stabilized Black Hole

[note]Use a §aScrewdriver§r to change mode[/note]

-----------------------------------------

The Space Scaler is a §931x31x32§r Spherical Multiblock, used as an upgrade to quite a few Multiblocks: Electric Implosion Compressor, Hot Isostatic Pressurization Unit, Black Hole Compressor, Neutronium Compressor, Dissection Apparatus, Compact Cyclotron, as well as doing Particle Collider recipes for late game. 

You’ll need: 

§c96§r Field Generators 

If you use §c24§r Ultimate Containment Field Generators, a §c10x§r speed multiplier will be applied. 
If you use §c24§r of EoH Field Gens, the Space Scaler will be able to run Particle Collider recipes. 

If you use §c24§r Harmony Stabilization Field Gens, the Space Scaler can run EIC and Neutronium Compressor Recipes. 

Primitive Stabilization Field Generators enable HIP unit recipes, and Stable Stabilization Field.

§dPortion written by Annie Penndragon§r
